metadata.synopsis: A local tries to buy "performance enhancing" medicine from a dragonborn nearby Sharess Caress. Human one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 9; 49;120- Talk to the human.

0.speaker: Cillian
0.text: I'm - I'm not doing anything. I mean, uh, good day to you.
0.context: NodeContext: mortified to be 'caught' by the player (while trying to buy magic viagra)

1.speaker: Cillian
1.text: I'm just buying, ah, bread off my friend here - everything is fine.
